description: MainActivity class for an Android TV Tic Tac Toe app, managing UI interactions, game state display, focus navigation via DPAD, and user input handling.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Handles UI of the Tic Tac Toe game, including focus management, user interactions, and rendering game state.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, binds UI components, sets focus, and sets up observers and event listeners.

methods.name: updateTurnText
methods.description: Updates the display of the current player's turn or game result.

methods.name: renderBoard
methods.description: Displays the game board based on the current state.

methods.name: handleCellSelect
methods.description: Handles user selection of a game cell, propagating the move via the ViewModel.

methods.name: showResultDialog
methods.description: Displays dialog indicating game result and offering to restart.

methods.name: showAboutDialog
methods.description: Displays an About dialog with app info.

methods.name: setDefaultFocus
methods.description: Sets initial focus to the center cell of the game board.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Intercepts key events to handle remote control DPAD and Select button presses.

methods.name: getColorCompat
methods.description: Retrieves a color resource with compatibility for older Android versions.
